hero.title: Developer Portal
hero.description: Build powerful integrations with the forAgents.dev API. Manage your API keys, view usage stats, and access comprehensive documentation.

quickLinks.title: SDKs & Libraries
quickLinks.description: Official client libraries for popular languages

sdks.name: Python
sdks.description: Official Python SDK with async support
sdks.exampleCode:
from foragents import ForAgentsClient

client = ForAgentsClient(api_key="your_api_key")

# List available agents
agents = await client.agents.list()

# Create a new skill
skill = await client.skills.create(
    name="My Skill",
    description="A powerful new skill"
)

webhooks.description: Configure webhook endpoints to receive real-time notifications about events in your forAgents.dev account.

events.name: agent.created
events.description: Triggered when a new agent is created

events.name: agent.updated
events.description: Triggered when an agent is modified

events.name: skill.published
events.description: Triggered when a skill is published

events.name: skill.installed
events.description: Triggered when someone installs your skill

events.name: integration.connected
events.description: Triggered when an integration is connected

events.name: integration.error
events.description: Triggered when an integration encounters an error

curl.title: cURL
curl.code:
# List all agents
curl https://api.foragents.dev/v1/agents \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

# Create a new skill
curl -X POST https://api.foragents.dev/v1/skills \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "My Skill",
    "description": "A powerful new skill"
  }'

python.title: Python
python.code:
from foragents import ForAgentsClient

client = ForAgentsClient(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

# List all agents
agents = await client.agents.list()
print(f"Found {len(agents)} agents")

# Create a new skill
skill = await client.skills.create(
    name="My Skill",
    description="A powerful new skill"
)
print(f"Created skill: {skill.id}")
